Name: Stay home and play with waifu!
About the game: What kind of game is it? And everything is very simple, a small simulator of a pleasant time with your waifu. Play tic-tac-toe with her, as a keepsake game, or look hard for different colors. For your choice in the game there are 7 girls. Any of them agree to being with you! Take it and use it until someone has taken your waifu! What can you get from this game? - 3 mini games: Tic tac toe, a memory game, a color search game. - 7 beautiful girls. - Each girl has 3 undressing stages, which adds more excitement! - After completing the challenge from the girl, you will get the opportunity to see a special sexual scene with the participation of the girl.
